mapper.select: SELECT CO_CD, REQ_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DT, CLNT_CD, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD = T.CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_NM, ODR_SEQ, PRJCT_CD, (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = T.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM, MAKR_CD, TYP_CD, OWNER_CD, IMP_YN, WH_CD, MNG_TEL, TO_CHAR(DLVR_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DLVR_DTTM, ADDR_ZIP, ADDR_MAIN, ADDR_SUB, ODR_RMK, DIRTRS_YN, TOT_QTY, TOT_WT, TOT_AMT, (SELECT SUM(ODR_AMT - ODR_QTY * STOCK_UPR) FROM TB_SD04D01 WHERE ODR_SEQ = T.ODR_SEQ) AS TOT_EPCT_PAL, SALES_MNG, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.SALES_MNG) AS SALES_MNG_NM, ODR_CREAT_DIV, CLOSE_YN, CLOSE_ID, CLOSE_DTTM, ETC_FIELD1, ETC_FIELD2, ETC_FIELD3, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM FROM TB_SD04M01 T WHERE ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq}

SELECT ODR_SEQ, ODR_DTL_SEQ, PRDT_CD, (SELECT PRDT_NM FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_NM, PRDT_SIZE, PRDT_SPEC, PRDT_UNIT, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_UNIT) AS PRDT_UNIT_NM, PRDT_LEN, (SELECT PRDT_STOCK_CD FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_STOCK_CD, ODR_QTY, ODR_WT, ODR_UPR, ODR_AMT, PRDT_UPR, STOCK_UPR, PCHS_UPR, SELL_UPR, (ODR_AMT - ODR_QTY * STOCK_UPR) AS EPCT_PAL, ODR_DTL_RMK, CLOSE_YN, CLOSE_ID, CLOSE_DTTM, ETC_FIELD1, ETC_FIELD2, ETC_FIELD3, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_OD01D01 WHERE ODR_DTL_SEQ = T.ODR_DTL_SEQ) AS ORDRG_DTL_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AR01D01 WHERE ODR_DTL_SEQ = T.ODR_DTL_SEQ) AS SHIP_DTL_CNT, NVL((SELECT REAL_DLVR_QTY FROM TB_OD01D01 WHERE ODR_DTL_SEQ = T.ODR_DTL_SEQ), 0) AS ORDRG_QTY, NVL((SELECT REAL_SHIP_QTY FROM TB_AR01D01 WHERE ODR_DTL_SEQ = T.ODR_DTL_SEQ), 0) AS SHIP_QTY FROM TB_SD04D01 T WHERE ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq}
SELECT * FROM TB_CM08M01 WHERE FILE_TRGT_TYP = 'TB_SD04M01' AND FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SD04D01 A LEFT JOIN TB_OD01D01 B ON A.ODR_DTL_SEQ = B.ODR_DTL_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_AR01D01 C ON A.ODR_DTL_SEQ = C.ODR_DTL_SEQ WHERE A.ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq} AND ( B.ORDRG_SEQ IS NOT NULL OR C.SHIP_DTL_SEQ IS NOT NULL )

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SD04M01 SET CO_CD = #{coCd}, REQ_DT = #{reqDt}, CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}, PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}, SITE_CD = #{siteCd}, MAKR_CD = #{makrCd}, TYP_CD = #{typCd}, OWNER_CD = #{ownerCd}, IMP_YN = #{impYn}, WH_CD = #{whCd}, MNG_TEL = #{mngTel}, DLVR_DTTM = #{dlvrDttm}, ADDR_ZIP = #{addrZip}, ADDR_MAIN = #{addrMain}, ADDR_SUB = #{addrSub}, ODR_RMK = #{odrRmk}, DIRTRS_YN = #{dirtrsYn}, TOT_QTY = #{totQty}, TOT_WT = #{totWt}, TOT_AMT = #{totAmt}, SALES_MNG = #{salesMng}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SD04D01 WHERE ODR_DTL_SEQ IN ( SELECT A.ODR_DTL_SEQ FROM TB_SD04D01 A LEFT JOIN TB_OD01D01 B ON A.ODR_DTL_SEQ = B.ODR_DTL_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_AR01D01 C ON A.ODR_DTL_SEQ = C.ODR_DTL_SEQ WHERE A.ODR_SEQ = #{odrSeq} AND B.ORDRG_SEQ IS NULL AND C.SHIP_DTL_SEQ IS NULL )
